title: Deep Positive-Unlabeled Anomaly Detection for Contaminated Unlabeled Data
details: H Takahashi, T Iwata, A Kumagai, Y Yamanaka - arXiv preprint arXiv:2405.18929, 2024
abstract: Semi-supervised anomaly detection, which aims to improve the performance of the anomaly detector by using a small amount of anomaly data in addition to unlabeled data, has attracted attention. Existing semi-supervised approaches assume that …

title: MANO: Exploiting Matrix Norm for Unsupervised Accuracy Estimation Under Distribution Shifts
details: R Xie, A Odonnat, V Feofanov, W Deng, J Zhang, B An - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Leveraging the models' outputs, specifically the logits, is a common approach to estimating the test accuracy of a pre-trained neural network on out-of-distribution (OOD) samples without requiring access to the corresponding ground truth labels …
